kpi.name: sgsn_776a
kpi.formula: (iumm2.iu_succ_intra_papu_re + iumm2.iu_succ_inter_papu_re + iumm2.iu_succ_inter_sgsn_re + iumm2.iu_fail_intra_papu_re_sgsn + iumm2.iu_fail_intra_papu_re_rnc + iumm2.iu_fail_intra_papu_reloc_coll + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_papu_re_sgsn + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_papu_re_rnc + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_papu_reloc_coll + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_sgsn_re_new_sgsn + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_sgsn_re_old_sgsn + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_sgsn_re_rnc + iumm2.iu_fail_inter_sgsn_reloc_coll)

kpi_info.title: Relocation attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of incoming relocation procedures
kpi_info.formula:

IU_SUCC_INTER_SGSN_RE +
IU_FAIL_INTRA_PAPU_RE_SGSN +

IU_FAIL_INTER_SGSN_RELOC_COLL)
